greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Divisor-or-multiple permutation of squarefree numbers: a(n) = A019565(A304083(n)).
comment: Each a(n+1) is either a divisor or a multiple of a(n).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..8191
program: A019565(n) = {my(j,v); factorback(Mat(vector(if(n, #n=vecextract(binary(n), "-1..1")), j, [prime(j), n[j]])~))}; \\ From A019565
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 06 2018
